lines: <cough> <cough> Pardon me. The fleece on my helm seems to soak up the dust, and then drop it in my face. The Force will need regular shearing if it is to succeed in Thanalan...

But tell me, adventurer: are you a sheep fancier? I mean no offense by it─I am one myself. Should you be interested in learning more about sheep, please speak with my superior, the hitsuji bugyo. You will find him in Limsa Lominsa, leading the Heavensturn festivities.
It is only a matter of time before the Brass Blades make contact, and I make my very first sale. They'll be here soon... Any moment now...
...Why do they not contact me!? Do you think I should go to them? No, no─remember what they told you at Blade headquarters: “Don't call on us, we'll call on you.”
